name: Rabbit&RABBIT
description:
Guide two rabbit friends in this head-crunching puzzle!

Eat carrots and blueberries and avoid the stingy sting of pesky bees. In this game you will play as Rabbit & RABBIT, two very different friends that are trying to get their belly full. Eat food, destroy bees, create match-three combos and avoid too many items from crowding the playfield. Every round has a series of action-coins that can be swapped between the two rabbits and reordered to decide the sequence of attacks, actions and movements your characters will perform.


Credits

Concept and Illustrations, Animations: Giulia Olivares (@giulai) 
Game Design, UI, Animations: Marco Trevisani (@greencoldmint) & Jacopo Rovida (@Jackrov) 
Game Design and Development: Mauro Vanetti (@maurovanetti)

This game was created at the Global Game Jam 2022 in Pavia, Italy.
